title: Reaper Undone
description: Sunshine, rainbows and unicorns? Yeah something's gotta give.Kick her while she’s down seems to be the motto when it comes to my life. But this time I’m clawing back. Hard.After the uncertainty and the heartache, I deserve a reprieve, and I’m damn well going to get it. My own personal Happy Ever After.But what they don’t tell you in the fairy tales is that happily ever after comes with a price. In my case, it’ll likely be one that kicks me in the teeth.Sometimes I bloody hate it when I’m right!A kickass Urban Fantasy romance, filled with vampires, ghosts, angels, and demons. Perfect for readers who enjoy forbidden romance, enemies to lovers or friends to lovers.
author: Debbie  Cassidy
